trans-unit.source: Role Schema
trans-unit.target: Role Schema

trans-unit.source: The <languageKeyword>Role</languageKeyword> element of the configuration file specifies the number of role instances to deploy for each role in the service, the values of any configuration settings, and the thumbprints for any certificates associated with a role.
trans-unit.target: The <languageKeyword>Role</languageKeyword> element of the configuration file specifies the number of role instances to deploy for each role in the service, the values of any configuration settings, and the thumbprints for any certificates associated with a role.

trans-unit.source: For more information about the Azure Service Configuration Schema, see <externalLink><linkText>Azure Service Configuration Schema</linkText><linkUri>http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/ee758710.aspx</linkUri></externalLink>.
trans-unit.target: For more information about the Azure Service Configuration Schema, see <externalLink><linkText>Azure Service Configuration Schema</linkText><linkUri>http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/ee758710.aspx</linkUri></externalLink>.

trans-unit.source: For more information about the Azure Service Definition Schema, see <externalLink><linkText>Azure Service Definition Schema</linkText><linkUri>http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/ee758711.aspx</linkUri></externalLink>.
trans-unit.target: For more information about the Azure Service Definition Schema, see <externalLink><linkText>Azure Service Definition Schema</linkText><linkUri>http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/ee758711.aspx</linkUri></externalLink>.

trans-unit.source: Role Element
trans-unit.target: Role Element

trans-unit.source: The following example shows the <languageKeyword>Role</languageKeyword> element and its child elements.
trans-unit.target: The following example shows the <languageKeyword>Role</languageKeyword> element and its child elements.

trans-unit.source: The following table describes the attributes for the <languageKeyword>Role</languageKeyword> element.
trans-unit.target: The following table describes the attributes for the <languageKeyword>Role</languageKeyword> element.

trans-unit.source: Attribute
trans-unit.target: Attribute

trans-unit.source: Description
trans-unit.target: Description

trans-unit.source: name
trans-unit.target: name

trans-unit.source: Required.
trans-unit.target: Required.

trans-unit.source: Specifies the name of the role.
trans-unit.target: Specifies the name of the role.

trans-unit.source: The name must match the name provided for the role in the service definition file.
trans-unit.target: The name must match the name provided for the role in the service definition file.

trans-unit.source: vmName
trans-unit.target: vmName

trans-unit.source: Optional.
trans-unit.target: Optional.

trans-unit.source: Specifies the DNS name for a Virtual Machine.
trans-unit.target: Specifies the DNS name for a Virtual Machine.

trans-unit.source: The name must be 10 characters or less.
trans-unit.target: The name must be 10 characters or less.

trans-unit.source: The following table describes the child elements of the <languageKeyword>Role</languageKeyword> element.
trans-unit.target: The following table describes the child elements of the <languageKeyword>Role</languageKeyword> element.

trans-unit.source: Element
trans-unit.target: Element

trans-unit.source: Description
trans-unit.target: Description

trans-unit.source: Instances
trans-unit.target: Instances

trans-unit.source: Required.
trans-unit.target: Required.

trans-unit.source: Specifies the number of instances to deploy for the role.
trans-unit.target: Specifies the number of instances to deploy for the role.

trans-unit.source: The number of instances is defined by an integer for the <languageKeyword>count</languageKeyword> attribute.
trans-unit.target: The number of instances is defined by an integer for the <languageKeyword>count</languageKeyword> attribute.

trans-unit.source: Setting
trans-unit.target: Setting

trans-unit.source: Optional.
trans-unit.target: Optional.

trans-unit.source: Specifies a setting name and value in a collection of settings for a role.
trans-unit.target: Specifies a setting name and value in a collection of settings for a role.

trans-unit.source: The setting name is defined by a string for the <languageKeyword>name</languageKeyword> attribute and the setting value is defined by a string for the <languageKeyword>value</languageKeyword> attribute.
trans-unit.target: The setting name is defined by a string for the <languageKeyword>name</languageKeyword> attribute and the setting value is defined by a string for the <languageKeyword>value</languageKeyword> attribute.

trans-unit.source: Certificate
trans-unit.target: Certificate

trans-unit.source: Optional.
trans-unit.target: Optional.

trans-unit.source: Specifies the name, thumbprint, and algorithm of a service certificate that is to be associated with the role.
trans-unit.target: Specifies the name, thumbprint, and algorithm of a service certificate that is to be associated with the role.

trans-unit.source: The certificate name is defined by a string for the <languageKeyword>name</languageKeyword> attribute.
trans-unit.target: The certificate name is defined by a string for the <languageKeyword>name</languageKeyword> attribute.

trans-unit.source: The certificate thumbprint is defined by a string of hexadecimal numbers containing no spaces for the <languageKeyword>thumbprint</languageKeyword> attribute.
trans-unit.target: The certificate thumbprint is defined by a string of hexadecimal numbers containing no spaces for the <languageKeyword>thumbprint</languageKeyword> attribute.

trans-unit.source: The hexadecimal numbers must be represented using digits and uppercase alpha characters.
trans-unit.target: The hexadecimal numbers must be represented using digits and uppercase alpha characters.

trans-unit.source: The certificate algorithm is defined by a string for the <languageKeyword>thumbprintAlgorithm</languageKeyword> attribute.
trans-unit.target: The certificate algorithm is defined by a string for the <languageKeyword>thumbprintAlgorithm</languageKeyword> attribute.
